name: WooCommerce Advanced Slider – 3D slider for Product & Category
author: TheInnovs

sections.description:
Make your Woo store more gorgeous and attractive with advanced 3D Slider!
This simple and easy user friendly plugin will allow you to show your products categories with a 3D slider and your products that will bring more sale without any extra effort!

ðŸ‘‰ Official Demo Link: Official Demo
ðŸ‘‰ Docs Link: Documentation
ðŸ‘‰ Feature Suggestion/Issue Track: GitHub

Core Features-

  • Category Slider
  1. 3D sliders
  2. 3 types of slides design (themes) are available
  3. Simple and Easy to use.
  4. Auto slide with nav bar
  5. Only nav bar
  6. Auto slider without nav bar
  • Features of Products Slider
  1. 4 Layouts with different Design
  2. Responsive and Mordern design
  3. Customize color, font-size, hover effect
  4. Show / Hide product title, Price of each slider
  5. Show / Hide view more button of each slider
  6. Show / Hide ‘Add to cart’ button of each slider
  7. Change/override ‘add to cart’ button and ‘view more’ button text
  8. Easy Control from Admin Panel
  9. New layout ( Total = 5 layouts )
    10.Live Control preview
  • How to use
  1. Navigate to WC Products Slider menu and copy shortcode (choose anyone from 3)
  2. Paste the shortcode on any page and done!
  • Fully compatible with Elementor, Gutenberg, Classic Editor.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder after extracting it to the “/wp-content/plugins/(the folder of the extracted plugin)” directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Now navigate to WC Products Slider menu and copy shortcode (choose anyone from 3)
  4. Paste the shortcode on any page and done!
sections.faq:
Is this free?

Yes, this is free!

Does it work with Gutenberg?

Yes, it does.

Can I ask or request for new feature?

Yes, you can! Request here-GitHub
sections.changelog:
1.1.3.4

[Fix] Compatibility with latest WP 6.4.3

1.1.3.3

[Fix] Compatibility with latest WP 6.0.3

1.1.3.2

[Fix] Compatibility with latest WP 5.8.1

1.1.3.1

[Tweak] Update layouts
[Fix] Compatibility with latest WP 5.7

1.1.3

[Feature] Add a new layout ( Total = 5 layouts )
[Feature] Live Control preview

1.1.2

[Fix] Compatibility Fixes with the latest WP

1.1.1

1.[Feature] Override Cart Button level
2. Override View More Button level
3. Responsiveness

1.1

[Feature] * Products Slider *
1) 4 layouts (themes)
2) Show or Hide ‘Add to cart’ button and change Font-size and Color [Default show]
3) Show or Hide Product price and change font-size and color [Default show]
4) Show or Hide View more button and change font-size and color [Default hide]
5) Show or Hide Product title and change font-size and color [Default show]
6) Easy Control from Admin Panel

1.0.3

  • [Fix] Gutenberg Editor publish error

1.0.2

  • Compatibility with Gutenberg Editor

1.0.1

  • Compatibility with Elementor Page Builder

1.0

  • Initial Release
